Diabetes diagnosis is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* Diabetes
* Diabetes diagnosis
* DiabetesStatus

#### Uses

Diabetes diagnosis is used by the model in the following places

* [Liver cancer](/model/LiverCancer)
* [Pancreas cancer](/model/PancreasCancer)
* [Diabetes condition](/model/DiabetesCondition)

#### Guidance

The user input is chosen from a list and should answer the question

> Do you have diabetes?

The user has the following answer options

* Yes
* No


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure that we have made to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Diabetes diagnosis is 2. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is impossible to change, but it could have been the consequence of your actions*
